body: This silver amulet protects the wearer from scrying and magical location just as a nondetection spell does. If a divination spell is attempted against the wearer, the caster of the divination must succeed on a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) against a DC of 19 (as if the wearer had cast nondetection on herself).
name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Neck/Neck Slot Wondrous Items/Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
